contextId.information: "I teach the Gentiles the message of faith and truth." Here, Paul may be using "faith" and truth" to express one idea. AT: "I teach the Gentile about the true faith" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_hendiadys]])
contextId.quote: I am a teacher of the Gentiles in faith and truth

contextId.information: Here "word of God" and "prayer" are used together to express one idea. The prayer is in agreement with the truth that God has revealed. AT: "it is dedicated for God's use by praying in agreement with his word" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_hendiadys]])
contextId.quote: it is sanctified by the word of God and prayer
